Layout: stacked, dense vertical hierarchy — large top slogan line, smaller secondary line, very large emphasized central word, then a narrow supportive line and a final punchline line; decorative small puffy white clouds used as separators and overlapping letter edges for layering. Graphics: cheerful cartoon sun face ornament (simple round eyes, wide smile, short radial rays) integrated near the central word as an accent; additional small puffy white clouds and tiny accent stars or sparkles around text.
